SingularWings.Exhibition_and_event1: The system is installed in a care center in Slovakia Košice.

Beatinfo_Health.memo1: Enables caregivers to easily monitor clients' health conditions and provide notifications.
Beatinfo_Health.memo2: BEATINFO Web Console helps companies and caregivers to monitor groups of people in real-time, see who is online and receive instant notifications.
Beatinfo_Health.memo3: BEATINFO Web Console allows users to view detailed physiological information for every single user, in real-time.
Beatinfo_Health.memo4: BEATINFO Web Console provides health history for every user. It is possible to browse it by the hour, day month, or week and also generate health reports.
Beatinfo_Health.memo5: Use physiological information data into detailed report information

work_content.3: Localization build with i18n (中 / English / 日文 / Slovensko etc.)

work_content.5: Customized charts and binded data with ECharts.js.
work_content.6: Embed Google Map with Google Map API.
work_content.8: Use MQTT and WebSocket server to communicate in real time.
